#include <cstdio>
#include <algorithm>
#include <iostream>
#include <string.h>
#include <stdio.h>

using namespace std;
const int N = 452;

string a, b, c;

int f[N][N][N];

int main(){
//    freopen("input.txt", "r", stdin);
    int t;
    scanf("%d", &t);
    while (t--){
        cin >> a >> b >> c;
        int la = a.size();
        int lb = b.size();
        int lc = c.size();
        for (int i = 0; i < la; ++i)
            for (int j = 0; j < lb; ++j)
                for (int k = 0; k < lc; ++k){
                    f[i+1][j+1][k+1] = f[i][j+1][k+1];
                    f[i+1][j+1][k+1] = max(f[i+1][j+1][k+1], f[i][j+1][k+1]);
                    f[i+1][j+1][k+1] = max(f[i+1][j+1][k+1], f[i+1][j][k+1]);
                    f[i+1][j+1][k+1] = max(f[i+1][j+1][k+1], f[i+1][j+1][k]);
                    if (a[i] == b[j] && b[j] == c[k])
                        f[i+1][j+1][k+1] = max(f[i+1][j+1][k+1], f[i][j][k] + 1);
                }
        cout << la*3 - f[la][lb][lc]*3 << endl;
    }
}
